dan ithin prashne thiyenne api "lu"yanna pawichchi kirima adu karanna ooneda nadda kiyana eka.ee gana thiranayak ganna thamayi me lipiya liyanna hithuwe.ithin me prashnedi oyalage adahas thamayi apita wadagath wenne yaluwane.ithin api me gana matha wimasumak damma.blog eke dakunu paththe thiyena ape matha wimasumata sahabhagi wela oyalage chande dala "lu"yanna pawichchi kirima gana adahasakuth dalama yanna amathaka karanna epa.
ee langa padyaya nomatha.

agamathiwaraya ha nagarika manthri athara samipa sabandathawa pennum karamin, siddhiyen pasu edinama agamathi ranil wika්ramasinha asala sitama gangaramaye “aagamika wathawathakata” ohu sahabhagiwi sitina darshanayak da, ohuge namin agamathita subha patha kolambaa nagaraye sthana gananawaka sawikara thibu wishala katawut wala dasunda sirasa wikashaya kale ya.

oonama motar rathayak thibena sthanaya, gaman karana dishawa aadi thorathuru rasak labagatha haki wana lesa nawa kramawedayak kriyathmaka kirima sambandhayen awadhanaya yomuwi athi bawa motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa pawasa sitiyi.

shri lankawe sancharaka karmanthayata ithamath wadagath sthanayak lesa salakiya haki rangun nawa gili giya sthanaye purawidyathmaka gaweshana katayuthu muhudu purawidya eekakaya wisin thawaduratath sidukaramin pawathi.

ee kasi thamange babalimata nowa an ayage babalimata yodawanne ruwa, ranganaya wagema hadawathath yahapath namya.nikol kidman, jenifar hadsan, keri woshintan, sharlis theron, ami pohiyar me lengathu hadawath athi tharakawan athara peramunema sitithi.kidman kanthawa balaganwimen da, hadsan adu aadayamlabhinta adhyapanaya labadimata wehesima wenuwen da, theron ech ayi wi / eeds pilibanda danuwath kirima ha paryeshanawalata upakarawima sambandhayen loka prakataya.
